nhc_headline: ...DEPRESSION MEANDERING OFF THE SOUTHEASTERN U.S. COAST... ...FORECAST TO BECOME A TROPICAL STORM LATER TODAY...
summary: ...DEPRESSION MEANDERING OFF THE SOUTHEASTERN U.S. COAST... ...FORECAST TO BECOME A TROPICAL STORM LATER TODAY... As of 2:00 AM EDT Sat Jul 05 the center of Three was located near 30.6, -78.8 with movement  at  mph. The minimum central pressure was 1010 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 35 mph.
